name: Touhou BHA4 - Bovine Brine Brawl
description:
This game may not perform well on lower end machines.

If you have performance issues, try lowering the "3D Scale" or use 2D backgrounds.

STORY

Reimu and Marisa have been magically transported to the Pickle Dimension!  The Pickle Dimension is a hazardous world where the ocean is made of vinegar and brine falls from the sky.  The only way out is to kill the only living thing on the Pickle Dimension:

The Pickled Cow

Reimu, with her evil sealing tickle amulets; and Marisa, with her missiles of doom; together they must work to defeat the might of the Pickled Cow

Do you have what it takes to escape from the Pickle Dimension?

Reimu:

Homing shot

Speed:  ***
Damage: ***
Range:  *****

Marisa:

Unfocus: Mild spread/shotgun shot; Focus: Forward-focus shot
